name: UWYO - TeamDynmaix Hardware Printout V1.2
description: This stylesheet corrects TeamDynamix's difficult to use printouts by removing unhelpful information entirely and putting client and problem info on the first page of the printout. This is designed to be used by our IT Maint, Image Center, and Service Center departments to ease tracking of systems physically at IT.
additional_info:
This version will not modify the styles displayed in the browser, but it can. 
Currently the style guide applies to all printed items from TD. This is due to the designated departments only print one screen. If exceptions need to be made for additional print screens email perrella@uwyo.edu with suggestions and screenshots or a leave a marked up printout in my mailbox.

Change Log:

V1.2 - Thursday, July 13, 2017.
Added support for dialog specific to the new Service Center kiosks.
